headline: Extra Space Storage Inc. Announces Tax Reporting Information for 2024 Distributions
summary: Extra Space Storage Inc. (NYSE:EXR) (the "Company") announced today the tax allocations of the Company's 2024 dividend distributions on its common stock. The allocations, as they will be reported on Form 1099-DIV, are as follows for common shares CUSIP# 30225T102:

headline: Extra Space Storage Inc. Announces Date of Earnings Release and Conference Call to Discuss 4th Quarter and Year-End 2024 Results
summary: Extra Space Storage Inc. (the "Company") (NYSE: EXR) announced today it will release financial results for the three months and year ended December 31, 2024 on Tuesday, February 25, 2025 after the market closes. The Company will host a conference call at 1:00 p.m. Eastern Time on Wednesday, February 26, 2025 to discuss its financial results. Hosting the call will be Extra Space Storage's CEO, Joe Margolis. Joining him will be Scott Stubbs, Executive Vice President and CFO.
